Name: Project R.A.T.
About the game: Take control of Chris P. Ratt, previously a diabetic test subject, who has now been mutated by an exceedingly high dose of cannabidiol into a fully capable super-rodent! Sling, slip, and slurp your way out of the dankest of labs to sweet freedom! Key Features: Launch across the lab in your gelatinous form Avoid hazardous materials to survive Make your way through an atmospheric single player experience Student Created Game
Meta Title: Project R.A.T.: May 29, 2018, Goop Troop and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Project R.A.T.? Check out the release date (May 29, 2018), developer insights from Goop Troop, and a complete game summary.
